content: The {{productName}} Wallet lets you easily purchase storage space and AI tools. Add funds to your wallet and select the services you need in the Services section to get started.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a brief introduction to the wallet feature, explaining its purpose and how to use it. The text appears in a container on a portal settings page. It provides context for users unfamiliar with the concept of purchasing storage space and AI tools.
